dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eridoria, a mystical realm of wonder and danger.

dialogue.speaker: Guardian of the Gate
dialogue.text: Greetings traveler. What brings you to our enchanted lands?

dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: I seek adventure and fortune in these fair realms.

dialogue.speaker: Guardian of the Gate
dialogue.text: A brave soul, I see. Very well, you may pass... but be warned, Eridoria is full of surprises.
